The start and end point pairs of convolution and cross-correlation of these signals would be<< ( ) (t1+t2,t2+t4) and (t1-t3,t2-t3). (x) (t1+t3,t2+t4) and (t1-t4,t2-t3). ( ) (t1+t3,t2+t3) and (t1-t4,t2-t3). ( ) (t2+t3,t2+t3) and (t1-t3,t2-t3).
>>8)The correlation of a signal with a shifted version of itself is known as ?<< ( ) Cross-correlation. (x) Auto-correlation.
